Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/Roosevelt
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, Roosevelt, Central Park, 16th & Pulaski due to street blockage near Pulaski/Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, Roosevelt, Central Park, 16th and Pulaski due to street blockage near Pulaski/Roosevelt.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #N5 South Shore Night Bus Temporary Reroute at 75th/Yates
